Plot: A retired mobster goes on a revenge spree after being left for dead with 22 bullets in his body by his former childhood friend.
Title: 22 Bullets
Writer: Franz-Olivier Giesbert (novel), Richard Berry (scenario and adaptation), Matthieu Delaporte (scenario and adaptation), Alexandre de La Patellière (scenario and adaptation), Richard Berry (dialogue), Matthieu Delaporte (dialogue), Alexandre de La Patellière (dialogue), Eric Assous (dialogue)
Actors: Jean Reno, Kad Merad, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Marina Foïs
